metadata.title: CVE-2014-5043 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
** REJECT **  DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER.  ConsultIDs: none.  Reason:This candidate was withdrawn by its CNA.  Further investigation showed thatit was not a security issue.  Notes: none.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-5043` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 0.8.8b+dfsg-5ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.8b+dfsg-5ubuntu0.1').
